mapper.select: SELECT id, cover, lesson_num as lessonNum, ( SELECT title FROM edu_subject WHERE id = edu_course.subject_parent_id ) AS subjectParentTitle, ( SELECT title FROM edu_subject WHERE id = edu_course.subject_id ) AS subjectTitle, ( SELECT NAME FROM edu_teacher WHERE id = edu_course.teacher_id ) AS teacherName, price FROM edu_course where id = #{id}
